name: Kero Kero!
description:
Kero! 

EDIT: Seems that the game is buggy and controls aren't the best, will update it asap.

Made for the frog jam in two days. Collect your frog coins and ride the platforms to safety! But careful now, must avoid the projectiles! Stay near the fire to be warm! hippity hoppity!

Controls

1 and 2 - Change camera angle

WASD - Movement

Can also click on screen to move to that location

Move your mouse cursor to a location on your screen to expand your view

Mouse scroll -  zoom in/out
